title: MARTA workers fired for borrowing equipment
title_page: MARTA workers fired for borrowing equipment
text:
"I don’t see that as a problem. It’s like a laptop. We have a camera, we use the camera. We use the microphone and we bring it back. We’ve always done that.”
That's what one former MARTA employee told the agency's investigators about his routine borrowing of audiovisual equipment for use in his TV production studio at home.
MARTA fired two employees and reprimanded a third for engaging the practice, which went on for years
The AJC obtained the investigation file to learn the details. See what else we found out.
